name: Pyramid Solutions
description:
Pyramid Solutions offers a unique combination of technology and industry expertise to deliver exceptional results for our clients. Our business technology solutions combine our breadth of expertise in software and hardware products with our software development and system integration services.
We are organized into technology practices that provide a unique combination of products, solutions and expertise. Our core practices include:
Enterprise Content Management– provides business process management, case management and document imaging solutions for financial services, insurance and government agencies.
Intelligent Manufacturing – specializes in manufacturing execution systems and factory automation solutions for automotive and discrete manufacturing companies.
Network connectivity – provides products and services that enable communications and network connectivity for companies that develop products and systems. We regularly serve industrial automation, vehicle manufacturing, energy and transportation industries.
Software development – focuses on providing turn-key custom software development and embedded system development services.
Our unique approach to working with our customers is a powerful asset for your company. It bridges the gap between vision and implementation for superior, seamless results. Our deep commitment to your success fosters a results-oriented partnership in which our teams bring your vision to life.
